content: °न्यासः a figure of speech in which a general proposition is adduced to support a particular instance, or a particular instance, to support a general proposition; it is an inference from particular to general and {%vice versa%}; उक्तिरर्थांतरन्यासः स्यात् सामान्यविशेषयोः . (1) हनुमानब्धिमतरद् दुष्करं किं महात्मनां .. (2) गुणवद्वस्तुसंसर्गाद्याति नीचोपि गौरवं . पुष्पमालानुषंगेण सूत्रं शिरसि धार्यते <ls>Kuval.</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> also <ls>K. P. 10</ls> and <ls>S. D. 709.</ls> (Instances of this figure abound in Sanskrit literature, especially in the works of Kālidāsa, Māgha and Bhāravi).
